rows.label: qev086802_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, Elma? Your crew saved that
Celica girl a while back, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0004
rows.name: Well, she came by with this...look on her face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0005
rows.name: Asked what a person has to do to become a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0006
rows.name: And what did you tell her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, I was just jokin' that clearin' a mission solo
would be a good start, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0008
rows.name:
Suddenly she looked all serious
and just turned and headed off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0009
rows.name: That sounds like trouble. We've got to find her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0011
rows.name:
With that look, there's no telling what
she might be planning, ya know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0012
rows.name: You shouldn't tease people who ask serious questions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0014
rows.name: You're right, you're right. My bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Let's just focus on finding her.
She can't have left the city yet.[ST:wait ]
